title: Classic Towing – More than 25 Years of Excellent Services in Illinois
text: Classic Towing – More than 25 Years of Excellent Services in Illinois United States, 23 September 2015 -- If you are in need of light or heavy duty towing, collision recovery and roadside assistance – car jumpstarting, lockout service, winch-out, fuel and diesel delivery, air delivery, flat tire change and several others – Classic Towing is your trusted service company. They also provide secure storage facilities, classic or antique car transport, tool box moves and cash for cars in Naperville, IL. They are a dedicated team of professionals who have the experience and the right equipment to cater to all your needs when on the road.When on the road, there are several problems that may arise, and some of these may be out of one’s control – dead battery, flat tire, getting stuck in the snow, and several others. Although some may be able to easily handle the problem, not every driver is experienced in such situations that they end up calling for light or heavy duty towing in Naperville, IL . This being said, Classic Towing is the company you should trust, because they have the manpower, experience and the right equipment to do the job efficiently and safely. When it comes to towing and roadside assistance, safety is a priority, not only for drivers who are directly involved but also for other motorists on the road. Thus, it is essential for one to hire a company that houses experienced professionals who can do the job properly. Also, they should have the necessary tools and equipment. For this reason, one needs to carefully search for the company that possesses these attributes. If you are in Naperville or surrounding areas, there is no need to search farther as Classic Towing is among the top options you have. Classic Towing has been in the business for over 25 years, providing Naperville, Aurora, Plainfield and other local areas with quality services and extremely fast response time. They cater to 24-hour towing service, collision recovery and roadside assistance for cars, SUVs, tractor-trailers, semi-trucks and several other types of vehicles. They are fully licensed and covered by a multi-million dollar insurance. Because of their dedication, they consistently acquire good customer reviews which prompted the BBB to give them an A+ rating. They are one company you can surely trust. One of the main services of the company is towing. They employ the latest, cutting-edge towing and recovery technology such as the eco-friendly, green emissions Hino flatbed trucks. These are equipped with a low profile LCG bed which is much lower than standard flatbed tow trucks. Thus, they are able to load vehicles with low ground clearance without causing any damage to the exhaust, valance and bumper which is common in standard tow trucks. Additionally, to further prevent auto body damage or even a scratch to the car’s paint, they utilize soft nylon tie-down system without hooks or chains that bend or scratch the vehicle. So, if you are in need of light or heavy duty towing in Naperville, IL , you can be assured of the best services if you call Classic Towing. When you get involved in a minor road mishap, the company will also come to your rescue. They offer expert collision recovery that will surely get you off the situation and save you from further causing damages. With their reputation for excellent services, they are also working hand-in-hand with several police departments in recovering vehicles involved in a road accident. Their team is experienced in handling vehicles that have rolled over, stuck on other objects or are under water. After the recovery, the vehicle is secured in their storage facility until your insurance company is able to send out an adjuster. However, if you prefer to have your vehicle directed to a collision repair center, they will tow it to your chosen shop. If you do not have any in your list, they can recommend you to their trusted auto body repair center for a quick and affordable fix. Aside from collision recovery and light or heavy duty towing in Naperville, IL , the company also caters to tons of roadside assistance such as winch-outs, car jumpstarting, fuel and diesel delivery, lockout service, flat tire change and air delivery, battery replacement and more. So, if you find yourself facing a car problem with help miles away, you can always give Classic Towing a call, and they will come to your aid immediately. Additionally, their team is capable of tool box moves, and motorcycle and classic (or antique) car transport. They have the experience and right equipment to successfully transport your specialty vehicles without causing a single scratch. However, this service is only for short-distance moves such as transporting the vehicle from the showroom to your home, or from your home to the repair center. Finally, if you have an old and dysfunctional car lying around in your backyard, you can still benefit from it, because the company also offer cash for junk cars in Naperville IL . So, instead of letting your junk car disintegrate into rubbish, have Classic Towing take a look, and you might just earn a huge amount for it. With all these services, Classic Towing is definitely the company you should call whenever you are faced with a road problem. From towing services, to roadside assistance, collision recovery, car transport and cash for junk cars in Naperville, IL , Classic Towing is just a call away. # # #
